headline: Ventas (VTR) Q2 Earnings: Taking a Look at Key Metrics Versus Estimates
summary: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for Ventas (VTR) give a sense of how the business performed in the quarter ended June 2025, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.

headline: Ventas (VTR) Beats Q2 FFO and Revenue Estimates
summary: Ventas (VTR) delivered FFO and revenue surprises of +2.35% and +3.47%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Ventas (VTR) Beats Q2 FFO and Revenue Estimates

headline: Ventas: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The Chicago-based real estate investment trust said it had funds from operations of $400.1 million, or 87 cents per share, in the period. The average estimate of six analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for funds from operations of 85 cents per share. Funds from operations is a closely watched measure in the REIT industry.

headline: Ventas Reports 2025 Second Quarter Results
summary: CHICAGO, July 30, 2025--Ventas, Inc. (NYSE: VTR) ("Ventas" or the "Company") today reported results for the second quarter ended June 30, 2025.
